attributes.action: Legalize LGBT marriage in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please join this petition if you believe LGBT marriage should be made legal.
The UK should prove to it's people and the world that it doesn't discriminate by changing 'Civil Partnership' to 'Marriage'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
